title: Sigma File Manager Extensions Registry
description: Schema for the official Sigma File Manager extensions registry. This is the source of truth for curated extension metadata displayed in the marketplace.

ExtensionEntry.description: A registered extension entry with curated metadata

id.description: Unique extension identifier in format 'publisher.extension-name'. Must match the id in the extension's package.json

name.description: Curated display name shown in the marketplace. Takes precedence over package name.

description.description: Curated description shown in the marketplace. This is the only source of description (not in package).

author.description: Verified author name. Takes precedence over package author.

authorUrl.description: Verified author profile URL (typically GitHub profile)

repository.description: GitHub repository URL. Used for fetching versions and downloading the extension.

featured.description: Whether this extension is featured in the marketplace. Featured extensions appear at the top.

categories.description: Curated categories for marketplace filtering. Takes precedence over package categories.

tags.description: Additional search keywords for discovery. Combined with package tags for search.
